dcterms:creator: Joseph Paul Cohen
Paul Morrison
Lan Dao
dcterms:description: A dataset containing chest X-ray images of COVID-19 patients, collected from various publications. The dataset includes a mix of chest X-ray and CT images, with a focus on anterior-posterior views that show clear signs of COVID-19.
dcterms:title: COVID-Xray-5k Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jeremy Irvin
Pranav Rajpurkar
Michael Ko
Yifan Yu
Silviana Ciurea-Ilcus
Chris Chute
Henrik Marklund
dcterms:description: A large public dataset for chest radiograph interpretation, consisting of 224,316 chest radiographs of 65,240 patients, labeled for the presence of 14 sub-categories including no-finding and pneumonia.
dcterms:title: ChexPert Dataset

dcterms:creator: Joseph Paul Cohen
Paul Morrison
Lan Dao
dcterms:description: A dataset containing chest X-ray images of COVID-19 patients, collected from various publications. The dataset is continuously updated and includes metadata about each patient.
dcterms:title: Covid-Chestxray-Dataset
